nodes.text: The Clacis sector was a sector in the Outer Rim Territories.
During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the sector was governed by Moff Garret Callron. The sector was later a part of the Imperial Remnant at the time of the Yuuzhan Vong War.
Planets in Clacis included Ord Sedra, which was attacked by the Yuuzhan Vong. A combined Imperial-New Republic force liberated the captives on the planet.
